name: Criteria2JPQL
short_description: Criteria2JPQL API is an adaptation of the powerful Hibernate Criteria API to standard JPA API enabling the compatibility with any orm tool. Against the native SQL queries created by Hibernate Criteria, Criteria2JPQL outputs standard JPQL queries.
